author: Rebecca Shabad
title: White House coronavirus coordinator sees 'early signs of hope,' but warns of second wave if Americans start going out
description: White House coronavirus coordinator sees 'early signs of hope,' but warns of second wave if Americans start going out
content:
WASHINGTON Dr. Deborah Birx, White House coronavirus response coordinator, said Wednesday that there are encouraging signs that parts of the U.S. may be flattening their curves but she warned that people shouldnt start going out and socially interacting.
